parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.label: Domain Name
parameters.query:
BloodHoundLogs_CL 
| where data_type == "posture_path"
| where created_at {time_range} 
| distinct domain_name
| order by domain_name

parameters.name: attack_path
parameters.label: Attack path
parameters.query:
BloodHoundLogs_CL
| where data_type == "posture_path"
| where created_at {time_range} 
| where domain_name startswith "{domain_name}"
| distinct path_type
| order by path_type

parameters.name: relationship_type
parameters.label: Relation Type
parameters.query:
BloodHoundLogs_CL
| where domain_name startswith "{domain_name}"
| where created_at {time_range}
 | where data_type == "posture_path"
| where path_type == "{attack_path}"
| extend PathCase = case(
    path_type hasprefix "LargeDefault", "LargeDefaultRelational",
    isnotempty(tier_zero_principal) and isnotempty(non_tier_zero_principal), "Relational",
    isnotempty(tier_zero_principal) and isempty(non_tier_zero_principal), "Configuration",
    "Unknown"
)
| limit 1
| project PathCase
| distinct PathCase

content.query:
BloodHoundLogs_CL
| where data_type == "posture_path"
| where created_at {time_range} 
| where path_type == "{attack_path}"
| where domain_name == "{domain_name}"
| summarize arg_max("updated_at", *) by non_tier_zero_principal, tier_zero_principal, principal
| extend PathType = path_type
| extend PathCase = case(
    PathType hasprefix "LargeDefault", "Case1",
    isnotempty(tier_zero_principal) and isnotempty(non_tier_zero_principal), "Case2",
    isnotempty(tier_zero_principal) and isempty(non_tier_zero_principal), "Case3",
    "Unknown"
)
// Create columns based on the PathCase
| extend ["Group"] = iff(PathCase == "Case1", non_tier_zero_principal, dynamic(null))
| extend ["Principal"] = iff(PathCase == "Case1", tier_zero_principal, dynamic(null))
| extend ["Non-Tier Zero Principal"] = iff(PathCase == "Case2", non_tier_zero_principal, dynamic(null))
| extend ["Tier Zero Principal"] = iff(PathCase == "Case2", tier_zero_principal, dynamic(null))
| extend ["Principal (Tier Zero)"] = iff(PathCase == "Case3", principal, dynamic(null))
| extend ["Column Check Error"] = iff(PathCase == "Unknown", tier_zero_principal, dynamic(null))
| extend ["PATH_CASE"] = PathCase
// Project the relevant columns
| project
    ["Non-Tier Zero Principal"],
    ["Tier Zero Principal"]

BloodHoundLogs_CL
| where data_type == "posture_path"
| where created_at {time_range} 
| where path_type == "{attack_path}"
| where domain_name == "{domain_name}"
| extend PathType = path_type
| extend PathCase = case(
    PathType hasprefix "LargeDefault", "Case1",
    isnotempty(tier_zero_principal) and isnotempty(non_tier_zero_principal), "Case2",
    isnotempty(tier_zero_principal) and isempty(non_tier_zero_principal), "Case3",
    "Unknown"
)
// Create columns based on the PathCase
| extend ["Group"] = iff(PathCase == "Case1", non_tier_zero_principal, "")
| extend ["Principal"] = iff(PathCase == "Case1", tier_zero_principal, "")
| extend ["Non-Tier Zero Principal"] = iff(PathCase == "Case2", non_tier_zero_principal, "")
| extend ["Tier Zero Principal"] = iff(PathCase == "Case2", tier_zero_principal, "")
| extend ["Principal (Tier Zero)"] = iff(PathCase == "Case3", tier_zero_principal, "")
| extend ["Column Check Error"] = iff(PathCase == "Unknown", tier_zero_principal, "")
| extend ["PATH_CASE"] = PathCase
// Project the relevant columns
| project
    ["Principal (Tier Zero)"]

BloodHoundLogs_CL
| where data_type == "posture_path"
| where created_at {time_range} 
| where path_type == "{attack_path}"
| where domain_name == "{domain_name}"
| extend PathType = path_type
| extend PathCase = case(
    PathType hasprefix "LargeDefault", "Case1",
    isnotempty(tier_zero_principal) and isnotempty(non_tier_zero_principal), "Case2",
    isnotempty(tier_zero_principal) and isempty(non_tier_zero_principal), "Case3",
    "Unknown"
)
// Create columns based on the PathCase
| extend ["Group"] = iff(PathCase == "Case1", non_tier_zero_principal, "")
| extend ["Principal"] = iff(PathCase == "Case1", tier_zero_principal, "")
| extend ["Non-Tier Zero Principal"] = iff(PathCase == "Case2", non_tier_zero_principal, "")
| extend ["Tier Zero Principal"] = iff(PathCase == "Case2", tier_zero_principal, "")
| extend ["Principal (Tier Zero)"] = iff(PathCase == "Case3", principal, "")
| extend ["Column Check Error"] = iff(PathCase == "Unknown", tier_zero_principal, "")
| extend ["PATH_CASE"] = PathCase
// Project the relevant columns
| project
    ["Group"],
    ["Principal"]

BloodHoundLogs_CL
| where data_type == "posture_path"
| where created_at {time_range} 
| where domain_name startswith "{domain_name}"
| where created_at {time_range} 
|  where path_type == "{attack_path}"
| summarize max(principal_count) by bin(created_at, 1d), domain_name
